   (1) Members of a compound are separated by periods.	(1) MembeH H of a ca umpount are sepa ratet bi peria uds.
   (2) External sandhi is decomposed with ^.	(2) ExteH nal sanDi iH decomposet wiT ^.
   (3) Prose sections are subdivided by a,b,c, etc..	(3) Prose sections are subdi videt bi a,b,c, etc..
   = Kauṭilīya.artha.śāstraṃ =	 KOwilIya.arTa. SAstram =

   (Chap.2, ṣection.1: Enumeration of the sciences)	(Shap.2, zection.1: Enumeration of Te sciet ces)
   ((i) Establishing (the necessity of) philosophy)	((i) EstabliH hinc (Te necesH iti of) PilosoPy)
   KAZ01.2.01/ ānvīkṣikī trayī vārttā daṇḍa.nītiś ca^iti vidyāḥ //	KAZ01.2.01/ AnvIkzikI trayI vArttA daNxa.nItiH ca^iti vidyAH //
   KAZ01.2.02/ trayī vārttā daṇḍa nītiś ca^iti mānavāḥ //	KAZ01.2.02/ trayI vArttA daNxa nItiH ca^iti mAnavAH //

   KAZ01.2.06/ daṇḍa.nītir ekā vidyā^ity auśanasāḥ //	KAZ 01.2.06/ daNxa.nItiH ekA vidyA^iti OSanasAH //
   KAZ01.2.07/ tasyāṃ hi sarva.vidyā.ārambhāḥ pratibaddhā iti //	KAZ 01.2.07/ tasyAm hi sarva.vidyA. AramBAH pratibadDAH iti //
   KAZ01.2.08/ catasra eva vidyā iti kauṭilyaḥ //	KAZ 01.2.08/ catasraH eva vidyA iti kOwilyaH //
   KAZ01.2.09/ tābhir dharma.arthau yad vidyāt tad vidyānāṃ vidyātvam //	KAZ 01.2.09/ tABiH Darma .arTO yat vidyAt tat vidyAnAm vidyA tvam //
   KAZ01.2.10/ sāṃkhyaṃ yogo lokāyataṃ ca^ity ānvīkṣikī //	KAZ 01.2.10/ sAMKyam yogaH lokAyatam ca^iti AnvIkzikI //

   KAZ15.1.46/ "vyasyaty enaṃ śreyasa iti vyasanam" iti //	KAZ 15.1.46/ "vyasyati enam SreyasaH iti vyasanam" iti //
   KAZ15.1.47/ dṛṣṭa.anto dṛṣṭa.anta.yukto nidarśanam //	KAZ 15.1.47/ dRzwa.antaH dRzwa.anta. yuktaH nidarSanam //
   KAZ15.1.48/ "vigṛhīto hi jyāyasā hastinā pāda.yuddham iva.abhyupaiti" iti	KAZ 15.1.48/ "vigRhItaH hi jyAyasA hastinA pAda. yudDam iva.aByupEti" iti
   KAZ15.1.49/ abhipluta.vyapakarṣaṇam apavargaḥ //	KAZ 15.1.49/ aBipluta. vyapakarzaNam apavargaH //
   KAZ15.1.50/ "nityam āsannam ari.balaṃ vāsayed	KAZ15.1.50/ "nityam Asannam ari.balam vAsayet 
   anyatra^abhyantara.kopa.śaṅkāyāḥ" iti //	anyatra^aByantara.kopa. SaFkAyAH" iti //
   KAZ15.1.51/ parair asamitaḥ śabdaḥ sva.saṃjñā //	KAZ 15.1.51/ parEH asamitaH SabdaH sva. saMjQA //
   KAZ15.1.52/ "prathamā prakṛtiḥ, tasya bhūmy.anantarā dvitīyā,	KAZ 15.1.52/ "praTamA prakRtiH, tasya BUmy.anantarA dvitIyA,
   bhūmy.eka.antarā tṛtīyā" iti //	BUmi .eka.antarA tRtIyA" iti //
   KAZ15.1.53/ pratiṣeddhavyaṃ vākyaṃ pūrva.pakṣaḥ //	KAZ 15.1.53/ pratizedDavyam vAkyam pUrva.pakzaH //
   KAZ15.1.54/ "svāmy.amātya.vyasanayor amātya.vyasanaṃ garīyaḥ" iti //	KAZ 15.1.54/ "svAmi .a mAtya. vyasanayoH amAtya. vyasanam garIyaH" iti //
   KAZ15.1.55/ tasya nirṇayana.vākyam uttara.pakṣaḥ //	KAZ 15.1.55/ tasya nirNayana. vAkyam uttara. pakzaH //
   KAZ15.1.56/ "tad.āyattatvāt, tat.kūṭa.sthānīyo hi svāmī" iti //	KAZ 15.1.56/ "tad.a Ayatta tvAt, tat.kUwa. sTAnIyaH hi svAmI" iti //
   KAZ15.1.57/ sarvatra.āyattam eka.antaḥ //	KAZ 15.1.57/ sarvatra.a Ayattam eka.antaH //
   KAZ15.1.58/ "tasmād utthānam ātmanaḥ kurvīta" iti //	KAZ 15.1.58/ "tasmAt utTAnam AtmanaH kurvIta" iti //
   KAZ15.1.59/ paścād evaṃ vihitam ity anāgata.avekṣaṇam //	KAZ 15.1.59/ paScAt evam vihitam iti anAgata .ava IkzaNam //
   KAZ15.1.60/ "tulā.pratimānaṃ pautava.adhyakṣe vakṣyāmaḥ" iti //	KAZ 15.1.60/ "tulA. pratimAnam pOtava.aDyakze vakzyAmaH" iti //
   KAZ15.1.61/ purastād evaṃ vihitam ity atikrānta.aveṣkaṇam //	KAZ 15.1.61/ purastAt evam vihitam iti atikrAnta .avezkaNam //
   KAZ15.1.62/ "amātya.sampad uktā purastāt" iti //	KAZ 15.1.62/ "amAtya. sampad uktA purastAt" iti //
   KAZ15.1.63/ evaṃ na^anyathā^iti niyogaḥ //	KAZ 15.1.63/ evam na^anyaTA^iti niyogaH //
   KAZ15.1.64/ "tasmād dharmyam arthyaṃ ca^asya^upadiśet, na^adharmyam	KAZ 15.1.64/ "tasmAt Darmyam arTyam ca^asya^upadiSet, na^aDarmyam
   anarthaym ca" iti //	anarTaym ca" iti //
   KAZ15.1.65/ anena vā^anena vā^iti vikalpaḥ //	KAZ15.1.65/ anena vA^anena vA^iti vikalpaH //
   KAZ15.1.66/ "duhitaro vā dharmiṣṭheṣu vivāheṣu jātāḥ" iti //	KAZ 15.1.66/ "duhitaraH vA DarmizWezu vivAhezu jAtAH" iti //
   KAZ15.1.67/ anena ca^anena ca^iti samuccayaḥ //	KAZ15.1.67/ anena ca^anena ca^iti samuccayaH //
   KAZ15.1.68/ "svayaṃjātaḥ pitur bandhūnāṃ ca dāyādaḥ" iti //	KAZ 15.1.68/ "svayaMjAtaH pituH banDUnAm ca dAyAdaH" iti //
   KAZ15.1.69/ anukta.karaṇam ūhyam //	KAZ15.1.69/ anukta.karaNam Uhyam //
   KAZ15.1.70/ "yathā ca dātā pratigrahītā ca na^upahatau syātāṃ	KAZ 15.1.70/ "yaTA ca dAtA pratigrahItA ca na^upahatO syAtAm
   tathā^anuśayaṃ kuśalāḥ kalpayeyuḥ" iti	taTA^anuSayam kuSalAH kalpayeyuH" iti
   KAZ15.1.71ab/ evaṃ śāstram idaṃ yuktam etābhis tantra.yuktibhiḥ /	KAZ 15.1.71ab/ evam SAstram idam yuktam etABiH tantra.yuktiBiH /
   KAZ15.1.71cd/ avāptau pālane ca^uktaṃ lokasya^asya parasya ca //	KAZ 15.1.71cd/ avAptO pAlane ca^uktam lokasya^asya parasya ca //
   KAZ15.1.72ab/ dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca pravartayati pāti ca /	KAZ 15.1.72ab/ Darmam arTam ca kAmam ca pravartayati pAti ca /
   KAZ15.1.72cd/ adharma.anartha.vidveṣān idaṃ śāstraṃ nihanti ca //	KAZ 15.1.72cd/ aDarma.anarTa. vidvezAn idam SAstram nihanti ca //
   KAZ15.1.73ab/ yena śāstraṃ ca śastraṃ ca nanda.rāja.gatā ca bhūḥ /	KAZ 15.1.73ab/ yena SAstram ca Sastram ca nanda.rAja. gatA ca BUH /
   KAZ15.1.73cd/ amarṣeṇa^uddhṛtāny āśu tena śāstram idaṃ kṛtam //	KAZ 15.1.73cd/ amarzeNa^udDRtAni ASu tena SAstram idam kRtam //
   EEE =End of the Arthaśāstra=	EEE =End of Te ArTa SAstra=
